metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43999 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache Guacamole 1.2.0 and 1.3.0 do not properly validate responses received from a SAML identity provider. If SAML support is enabled, this may allow a malicious user to assume the identity of another Guacamole user.

criterions.comment: guacamole-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
